long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension displays your favorite twitch channels which are currently live.
SETUP: Go to "MANAGER USERS" and add your favourite streamers!

You can easily check how many of your favourites streamers are online thanks to the number over the extension icon that displays the current number of your followed streamers that are live.
The streamers are listed by the game they are currently playing.

Since the changes of Twitch API in 2023, you can no longer check the users followed by an user that's why you now have to enter the users manually.

This extension is made calling the new API of Twitch HELIX and OAUTH Token authorization.

Share your experience at the Chrome Store and rate Twitch Streamers extension
Extension made by Adrián Arbizu Donoso (Spain). 
Framework used: Angular 16
